1 'use strict';
  2 
  3 var _ = require('underscore');
  4 var Promise = require('./promise');
  5 var localStorage = require('./browserify-wrapper/localStorage');
  6 
  7 var syncApiNames = [
  8   'getItem',
  9   'setItem',
 10   'removeItem',
 11   'clear'
 12 ];
 13 
 14 if (!localStorage.async) {
 15   // wrap sync apis with async ones.
 16   _(syncApiNames).each(function(apiName) {
 17     if (typeof localStorage[apiName] === 'function') {
 18       localStorage[apiName + 'Async'] = function() {
 19         return Promise.as(localStorage[apiName].apply(localStorage, arguments));
 20       };
 21     }
 22   });
 23 } else {
 24   _(syncApiNames).each(function(apiName) {
 25     if (typeof localStorage[apiName] !== 'function') {
 26       localStorage[apiName] = function() {
 27         throw new Error('Synchronous API [' + apiName + '] is not available in this runtime.');
 28       };
 29     }
 30   });
 31 }
 32 
 33 module.exports = localStorage;
 34
